title: unable to share folder to the other oc users in 5.0.8
body:
hi,

### expected behaviour
i just noticed that i cannot share folder to the other oc users. 

### actual behaviour
i cannot confirm username that i typed in "share with" input. 
autocomplete doesn't work as well.

### steps to reproduce
1. create user foo
2. create folder bar
3. try to share folder bar with user foo by typing his name and confirm 

### server configuration
operating system: debian sid

web server: apache2 - the newest from repo

database: sqlite3 - provided by oc

php version: 5 -  the newest from repo

owncloud version: 5.0.8

### client configuration
browser: firefox - the newest

operating system: win8

### logs
#### web server error log
```
insert your webserver log here

[fri jul 12 22:34:25.409988 2013] [negotiation:error] [pid 27135] [client 192.168.2.1:62694] ah00687: negotiation: discovered file(s) matching request: /usr/share/owncloud/settings/users (none could be negotiated)., referer: https:/host.tld/index.php/apps/files
[fri jul 12 22:34:26.761127 2013] [negotiation:error] [pid 27876] [client 192.168.2.1:62698] ah00687: negotiation: discovered file(s) matching request: /usr/share/owncloud/settings/ajax/userlist (none could be negotiated)., referer: https://host.tld/index.php/settings/users


#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
```
insert your owncloud log here
nothing interesting
